item.text: Recognizes: (1) the achievements of the players, coaches, fans, and staff whose dedication helped the Minnesota Lynx win the 2015 Women's National Basketball Association championship; and (2) the Twin Cities area and the state of Minnesota for supporting women's professional basketball.
item.name: Introduced in Senate

item.text:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Recognizes: (1) the achievements of the players, coaches, fans, and staff whose dedication helped the Minnesota Lynx win the 2015 Women's National Basketball Association championship; and (2) the Twin Cities area and the state of Minnesota for supporting women's professional basketball.
item.name: Passed Senate without amendment

bill.title: A resolution congratulating the Minnesota Lynx on their victory in the 2015 Women's National Basketball Association Finals.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

item.latestTitle: Congratulating the Minnesota Lynx women's basketball team on winning the 2015 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
